title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 368.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 368.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term
division shall mean the State Division of Probation and Correctional

Alternatives as established by article 12 of the Executive Law; and, further, for the purpose of this Part, the State Probation Commission as established by
this same article, where appropriate and separately amended. (b) The term records access officer shall
mean the counsel of the division and any assistants designated by such
individual to perform any or all functions hereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
368.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
